30 #include "StringUtils.hpp"
31 #include "GNSSconstants.hpp"

33 #include "YumaData.hpp"
34 #include "YumaStream.hpp"

36 
37 using namespace gpstk::StringUtils;
38 using namespace std;
39 
40 namespace gpstk
41 {
42  short YumaData::nearFullWeek = 0;
43 
44  const std::string YumaData::sID = "ID:";
45  const std::string YumaData::sHlth = "Health:";
46  const std::string YumaData::sEcc = "Eccentricity:";
47  const std::string YumaData::sTOA = "Time of Applicability(s):";
48  const std::string YumaData::sOrbI = "Orbital Inclination(rad):";
49  const std::string YumaData::sRRA = "Rate of Right Ascen(r/s):";
50  const std::string YumaData::sSqrA = "SQRT(A) (m 1/2):";
51  const std::string YumaData::sRtAs = "Right Ascen at Week(rad):";
52  const std::string YumaData::sArgP = "Argument of Perigee(rad):";
53  const std::string YumaData::sMnAn = "Mean Anom(rad):";
54  const std::string YumaData::sAf0 = "Af0(s):";
55  const std::string YumaData::sAf1 = "Af1(s/s):";
56  const std::string YumaData::sweek = "week:";
57 
58  void YumaData::reallyPutRecord(FFStream& ffs) const
59  throw(std::exception, FFStreamError,
60  gpstk::StringUtils::StringException)
61  {
62  YumaStream& strm = dynamic_cast<YumaStream&>(ffs);
63 
64  const int width=27;
65  strm << "******** Week" << setw(5) << (week % 1024)
66  << " almanac for PRN-" << PRN
67  << " ********" << endl
68  << left
69  << setw(width) << sID << PRN << endl
70  << setw(width) << sHlth << hex << SV_health << endl
71  << setw(width) << sEcc << ecc << endl
72  << setw(width) << sTOA << Toa << endl
73  << setw(width) << sOrbI << (i_offset + 54.0 * (gpstk::PI / 180.0)) << endl
74  << setw(width) << sRRA << OMEGAdot << endl
75  << setw(width) << sSqrA << Ahalf << endl
76  << setw(width) << sRtAs << OMEGA0 << endl
77  << setw(width) << sArgP << w << endl
78  << setw(width) << sMnAn << M0 << endl
79  << setw(width) << sAf0 << AF0 << endl
80  << setw(width) << sAf1 << AF1 << endl
81  << setw(width) << sweek << week << endl;
82  } // end YumaData::reallyPutRecord
83 
84 
85  string YumaData::lineParser(const string& line, const string& s)
86  const throw(FFStreamError)
87  {
88  int i = line.find_first_of(":");
89 
90  // Gotta have a colon or the format is wrong
91  if (i == string::npos)
92  GPSTK_THROW(FFStreamError("Format error in YumaData"));
93 
94  // Only compare the first five characters since some files differ after that
95  int w = std::min(5, std::min(i, (int)s.size()));
96  if (line.substr(0,w) != s.substr(0,w))
97  GPSTK_THROW(FFStreamError("Format error in YumaData"));
98 
99  return stripLeading(line.substr(i+1), " ");
100  }
101 
102 
103  void YumaData::reallyGetRecord(FFStream& ffs)
104  throw(std::exception, FFStreamError,
105  gpstk::StringUtils::StringException)
106  {
107  YumaStream& strm = dynamic_cast<YumaStream&>(ffs);
108 
109  string line;
110 
111  // We don't need first line as we will get all the information from the others
112  strm.formattedGetLine(line, true);
113 
114  //Second Line - PRN
115  strm.formattedGetLine(line, true);
116  PRN = asInt(lineParser(line, sID));
117 
118  //Third Line - Satellite Health
119  strm.formattedGetLine(line, true);
120  SV_health = asInt(lineParser(line, sHlth));
121 
122  //Fourth Line - Eccentricity
123  strm.formattedGetLine(line, true);
124  ecc = asDouble(lineParser(line, sEcc));
125 
126  //Fifth Line - Time of Applicability
127  strm.formattedGetLine(line, true);
128  Toa = (long) asDouble(lineParser(line, sTOA));
129 
130  //Sixth Line - Orbital Inclination
131  strm.formattedGetLine(line, true);
132  double i_total = asDouble(lineParser(line, sOrbI));
133  i_offset = i_total - 54.0 * (gpstk::PI / 180.0);
134 
135  //Seventh Line - Rate of Right Ascen
136  strm.formattedGetLine(line, true);
137  OMEGAdot = asDouble(lineParser(line, sRRA));
138 
139  //Eigth Line - SqrtA
140  strm.formattedGetLine(line, true);
141  Ahalf = asDouble(lineParser(line, sSqrA));
142 
143  //Ninth Line - Right Ascen at Week
144  strm.formattedGetLine(line, true);
145  OMEGA0 = asDouble(lineParser(line, sRtAs));
146 
147  //Tenth Line - Argument of Perigee
148  strm.formattedGetLine(line, true);
149  w = asDouble(lineParser(line, sArgP));
150 
151  //Eleventh Line - Mean Anomaly
152  strm.formattedGetLine(line, true);
153  M0 = asDouble(lineParser(line, sMnAn));
154 
155  //Twelfth Line - Af0
156  strm.formattedGetLine(line, true);
157  AF0 = asDouble(lineParser(line, sAf0));
158 
159  //Thirteenth Line - Af1
160  strm.formattedGetLine(line, true);
161  AF1 = asDouble(lineParser(line, sAf1));
162 
163  //Fourteenth Line - week
164  // Its unclear whether this is a full week or week % 1024
165  strm.formattedGetLine(line, true);
166  week = asInt(lineParser(line, sweek));
167 
168  if (nearFullWeek > 0)
169  {
170  // In case a full week is provided.
171  week %= 1024;
172  week += (nearFullWeek / 1024) * 1024;
173  short diff = nearFullWeek - week;
174  if (diff > 512)
175  week += 512;
176  else if(diff < -512)
177  week -= 512;
178  }
179 
180  xmit_time = 0;
181  strm.formattedGetLine(line,true);
182 
183  } // end of reallyGetRecord()
184 
185  void YumaData::dump(ostream& s) const
186  {
187  cout << "PRN = " << PRN << endl;
188  cout << "week = " << week << endl;
189  cout << "SV_health = " << SV_health << endl;
190  cout << "ecc = " << ecc << endl;
191  cout << "Toa = " << Toa << endl;
192  cout << "i_offset = " << i_offset << endl;
193  cout << "OMEGAdot = " << OMEGAdot << endl;
194  cout << "Ahalf = " << Ahalf << endl;
195  cout << "OMEGA0 = " << OMEGA0 << endl;
196  cout << "w = " << w << endl;
197  cout << "M0 = " << M0 << endl;
198  cout << "AF0 = " << AF0 << endl;
199  cout << "AF1 = " << AF1 << endl;
200  cout << "xmit_time = " << xmit_time << endl;
201 
202  } // end of dump()
203 
204  YumaData::operator AlmOrbit() const
205  {
206  AlmOrbit ao(PRN, ecc,i_offset, OMEGAdot, Ahalf, OMEGA0,
207  w, M0, AF0, AF1, Toa, xmit_time, week, SV_health);
208 
209  return ao;
210 
211  } // end of AlmOrbit()
212 } // namespace
